tier.item: I consider that John is smart
`I consider John to be smart' (literally: "I consider John that (he) is smart")
`I consider John to be smart' (literally: "I consider John that (he) is smart")
I consider John to be smart
`John is taught grammar' / *`John teaches himself grammar'.
`John is taught grammar' / *`John teaches himself grammar'.
I consider John to be brave
